==Useful Info==
'''Tarantellas''' are non-[[poison]]ous spiders that inflict [[confusion]] with their touch. They are thankfully fairly fragile, but often appear along with other spiders. They can be found in the [[Spider's Nest]].

==Tips & Tricks==
*[[Poison resistance]], poison immunity, and [[willpower]] do nothing to stop their confusion effect. Other than not getting hit, only [[clarity]] can prevent the confusion.
*A [[potion of curing]] will cure confusion. [[Elyvilon]]'s Purification and [[Ru]]'s Draw Out Power can also cure it.
*They're vulnerable to poison themselves, so [[Mephitic Cloud]] can take them out of commission easily.
*Tarantellas might be fragile, but they're fast and they hit about as hard as [[yak]]s, even without the added confusion. Be careful if you're fighting lots of [[list of arachnids|spiders]] at once.

==Trivia==
Note that these monsters aren't named "tarantulas"; instead, they are named after [[wikipedia:tarantella|tarantella]]s, a type of Italian folk dance.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.17]], chunks from tarantella [[corpse]]s were poisonous.
